#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
#include <queue>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
#include <time.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <cstring>
 
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long p,q;
        scanf("%lld %lld",&p,&q);
        if(p>2*q)
            printf("%s\n","NO");
        else
        {
            while(p<q)
                p = p*2;
            if(p==q)
                printf("%s\n","YES");
            else
            {
                long long k = p-q;
                while(k<p)
                    k=k*2;
                if(k==p)
                    printf("%s\n","YES");
                else printf("%s\n","NO");
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
